medical_history.chief_complaint: Bilateral back pain radiating to the epigastrium.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Pain started on Wednesday morning, described as sharp and constant. No nausea until presented to the emergency department yesterday. Last meal was soup at 2 PM yesterday, which worsened the pain.
medical_history.family_history: Three sisters are healthy with no family history of cancer, hypertension, or gastrointestinal issues.
